Class Clock

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • game.engine.time.Clock

    public class Clock
extends java.lang.Thread
    A FPS pulser.
    Author:
    Marvin Bruns

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Stop the clock and terminate the thread. It makes the clock unusable. A clock can not be restarted.
        Overrides:
        destroy in class java.lang.Thread
